Merge pull request #1368 from wordpress-mobile/issue/1258-drop-gingerbread-support

fix #1258 drop gingerbread support
First pass at merging with post-gingerbread code
more post-gingerbread fixes
Removed Build.Version checks along with @TargetApi and @SuppressLint annotations
Cleaned up fullscreen code for post-gingerbread world
ReaderReblogActivity and ReaderUserListActivity now extend Activity rather than FragmentActivity
Header dividers are now always disabled in reader post list
Fixed missing background color in note follow list
Added bottom border to header on tag preview
Tag preview header is now inserted dynamically without requiring a container defined in the layout xml
Blog preview header is now inserted dynamically without requiring a container defined in the layout xml
Added bottom border to blog preview header
Fixed bug that caused blog preview header to appear in the wrong place when returning from another fragment
Added thin top border between blog preview information and mshot
Fixed bug that caused blog preview header to extend too far, overlapping part of the first post
Cleanup based on code analysis
Removed logic for retaining then resetting title in post detail (no longer necessary)
Added code to enforce max photon image size, to avoid http 400 when images too large are requested
Tapping the mshot now opens the blog in the browser
mshot for private blogs now shows error icon
fixed bug that caused blog info to be positioned incorrectly after rotating device

Base the maximum thumbnail size on the smaller dimension of the screen size.

The issue was the if you added an image while in landscape, the thumbnail size would be larger than the editor could display if the device was rotated to portrait.

Also fixed inconsistent image size when adding an image that needs to be downloaded over the network. Fixes #1407

Fixes #1407
Take advantage of DisplayUtils.getDisplayPixelSize().
